name: Magical Girl Chess Club
description:
Magical Girl Game Jam 4 submission

Only one member of the Shinhigaku high school chess club remains, its president, Kazuko.  Soon this will all be over, soon you will have your revenge for what they did to your beloved Hara.  All that is needed is to find Kazuko and make her pay.

Note: Due to family and personal commitments I no longer have time to code the actual ending to the game.  There is no new story content after the confrontation with Kazuko.
